summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; approving preliminary plans for a residential planned unit development on an approximately 8.14 acre tract zoned Duplex Residence Medium Density (RD 7200) and Multiple Residence Low Density (RM800) located at the northeast corner of the intersection of Greenwood Avenue North and North 130th Street (Petition of Evangel Community Church, C.F. 289689), and amending Plat 219W, page 3 of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle (86300).
